existing_features.title: Create a professional, animated, and visually attractive public-facing hospital website for SAMPARC MEDICAL with a clean medical theme (white, teal/green, and gold accents), smooth scroll animations, hero section, and consistent typography throughout all pages.
Design and generate a custom logo for SAMPARC MEDICAL (a medical cross or caduceus symbol combined with the hospital name) and display it prominently in the header/navbar of the website.

Add an 'About Us' section on the public website featuring professional bios for Founder Director/Secretary AMITKUMAR BANERJEE and CEO ANUJ SINGH, with positive, professionally written descriptions about their vision, leadership, and contributions to healthcare.

Add a Contact section on the public website displaying: hospital address (SAMPARC MEDICAL, Nearby Malavali Railway Station, Samparc Malavali Campus, Near Malavli, Malavli, Maharashtra 410405), email (samparc6@gmail.com), customer care phone (+91 9766343454), customer care WhatsApp link (+91 9766343454), cross WhatsApp link (+91 9270556455), and CEO contact/WhatsApp (+91 9766343456).

Implement an AI chat assistant widget on the public website (floating button in the bottom-right corner) that allows customers to ask questions about the hospital, services, medicines, and general health queries. The assistant should respond helpfully using pre-defined knowledge and scripted responses about SAMPARC MEDICAL. It should also be able to answer general medical FAQ questions.
Create a Medicines/Pharmacy section on the public website that displays the list of available medicines stored in the backend, with name, description, and price fields visible to visitors.

Build a protected Admin Dashboard accessible at /admin route. Login is protected by hardcoded credentials: email (gauravsaswade2009@gmail.com) and password (p1love2g). The dashboard must be accessible from any device/browser. On successful login, show the admin panel; on failure, show an error message.

Build the Admin Dashboard UI with the following management sections: (1) Medicines Manager — add, edit, delete medicines with a form and table; (2) Website Content Editor — edit hero text, about section text, services list, and announcements; (3) Overview panel showing medicine count and quick stats. All changes must persist via backend canister calls.

Add a Services section on the public website showcasing hospital services (e.g., General Medicine, Emergency Care, Pharmacy, Diagnostics, Patient Consultation) with icons and short descriptions. This content should be editable from the admin dashboard.

Add a site-wide footer with hospital name (SAMPARC MEDICAL), address, email, phone numbers, WhatsApp links, social/contact quick links, and a copyright notice. Include a positive tagline about SAMPARC MEDICAL.
